system.descriptionText:
A Horrifying fusion of Machine and Daemonflesh.
Has Protection 30 Forcefield, never overloads. Bypassed by Sanctified or Force Weapons, or Damaging Psychic Powers.
Regains 1d5 Structural Integrity, or 1 Critical Damage per Round.

description.value: A Horrifying fusion of Machine and Daemonflesh. Has Protection 30 Forcefield, never overloads. Bypassed by Sanctified or Force Weapons, or Damaging Psychic Powers. Regains 1d5 Structural Integrity, or 1 Critical Damage per Round.
